colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI KHAL KHA'I GA-YAS RU SA NA 'ANG NO YON CHING WANG GYIS SDER GTOGS AER TE MER GEN NO YON HU THOG THU'I MING 'DZIN BTAGS PA TZAM GYIS 'JIG RTEN CHOS BRGYAD KYIS SMYON DGRES PA PHRAN CHUNG ^BSOD @005B NAMS TSE RING GIS GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU SNYIGS MA'I SEMS CAN LA PHAN THOGS PA'I BSAM PAS BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG GSUNG RAB KYI TSIG 'DUG KYANG TSIG DON MA SHES NA MA 'BREL BA'I NYES LTUNG BYUNG BAS BSHAGS PA BYAS NA SNYAM DU BSAM NAS DAG PA'O, ,DE'I PHYIR ZHE NA BYIN RLABS MYUR STZOL 'DOD DGU'I CHAR 'BEBS BKRA SHIS YAR 'PHEL PA 'DI KYANG BSTAN 'GRO'I LEGS TSOGS RGYA CHEN PO'I BSAGS PA'ANG THE TSOM MED PAR KHA 'DON ZUR DU BKOD PA BZANG PO'I BKRA SHIS DANG DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
